strategy_text: This marketing strategy is tailored for the fashion e-commerce industry, specifically targeting women aged 25-45 who are urban professionals and fashion-conscious. The current performance indicates a strong market share with a monthly revenue of approximately $1.5M, reflecting the brand's resonance with its audience. The strategy involves optimizing existing channels, amplifying reach through newer platforms like TikTok, and enhancing customer engagement to improve repeat sales.

weaknesses.title: Limited engagement in Email
weaknesses.description: Open rates at 22% are below industry standards

tactics.name: Loyalty Program
tactics.description: Points-based system to incentivize repeat purchases

tactics.name: TikTok Expansion
tactics.description: Leverage influencer partnerships to reach new demographics

tactics.name: Email Optimization
tactics.description: Implement segmentation & personalization for targeted messaging

tactics.name: SEO Investment
tactics.description: Focus on organic traffic growth through targeted keywords

tactics.name: Pinterest Advertising
tactics.description: Utilize visual discovery ads to capture fashion interest
